<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CargarMASMonitorSalud</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	g_form.setReadOnly('instancia_primaria_bcr',true);
	var gaa = new GlideAjax('llamadoMasBCR');
	gaa.addParam('sysparm_name', 'llamadoMasBCRMethod');
	gaa.getXML(HelloWorldParse);
	function HelloWorldParse(response) {
		var reponseScriptData = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		//aqui tengo que ver como diablos obtengo el valor del script includes
		var valor = reponseScriptData.split(',');
		//lleno el selectBox
		g_form.setValue('instancia_primaria_bcr',valor[0]);
		
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-01 21:14:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>56c0a0474f563300c09fb8de9310c777</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CargarMASMonitorSalud</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_56c0a0474f563300c09fb8de9310c777</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>114190586</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-09 18:56:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
